title: productSpecRef
description: A reference (by name, id or link) to a Product Specification.

objectType.description: The type of the object, A Product Specification Reference.

name.description: The name a product (specification) is known by within an organization (e.g., Access EVPL 100).

code.description: Unique identifier that an organization uses for a product (specification) in its internal systems that can refer to one or a set of products (e.g., AEVPL100).

productSpecification.description: A reference to the Partner/Access Provider (Seller) Product Specification (product catalog item) that the buyer is ordering.
